events.message: I ordered a laptop two weeks ago and the delivery has not arrived yet. The tracking info hasn't updated in days.
The system has classified this customer issue under the Delivery Delay cluster based on keywords like 'delivery' and 'tracking'.
Customer support agent Alex has been assigned to handle the delivery delay case for this order.
Hello! I’m Alex from customer support. I’m here to help you check the status of your delayed laptop delivery.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate further?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The last tracking update was five days ago and it still shows 'in transit.'
I’ve checked with the shipping carrier; there is a delay due to weather conditions. We expect your package to arrive within three business days.
Thanks for the update. I understand the delay is due to weather. Please keep me informed if anything changes.
We consider the issue addressed now given the shipping update. Please contact us if the package doesn't arrive within the provided timeframe.
Following up on your delivery, we hope your laptop has arrived safely. Please let us know if you require any further assistance.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and please don't hesitate to reach out with any future concerns.
